title: Seek thermal camera is not being detected by Pixel 3a
content:
Has anyone here used the Seek Thermal camera? I'm tried using it and the Pixel 3a doesn't recognize the device. I reached out to Seek but thought I would try here too.

I don't get an error message or pop-up or notification. I plug the camera in and nothing happens. The Seek App just states that it cannot find the hardware.

I'll keep looking around for answer...while I wait for responses.
